mapper.sql: user_id, username, phone, ip, create_time, update_time, chan_name, soft_channel_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, username, phone, ip, create_time, update_time, chan_name, soft_channel_id) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_user
user_id,
username,
phone,
ip,
create_time,
update_time,
chan_name,
soft_channel_id,
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{username,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=CHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
chan_name = #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR},
soft_channel_id = #{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chan_name = #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR}, soft_channel_id = #{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select u.phone, u.create_time as createTime, d.chan_name as chanName, d.versioncode as versionCode, d.buildversion as buildVersion, d.manufacturer, d.androidmodel from t_user u left join t_user_device ud on u.user_id = ud.user_id left join t_device d on ud.device_id = d.device_id
AND u.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
